data.title: Marine Industry
data.meta_description: This chapter describes the use of adhesive bonding to assemble structures in the marine industry. The marine environment is extremely aggressive, and this has resulted in the widespread use of fiber-reinforced composite materials. Adhesive bonding is a lightweight...
